My name is Elizabeth but please call me Lisa.

I'm probably best known as the person who started the #Safari and #WebKit projects at #Apple. You may think you know my deadname but... you don't.

I've drawn underground comics, pioneered using a Mac for newspaper graphics and developed software at Adobe and Netscape.

Now I write video #transcoding scripts and sometimes podcast.

Follow me and I'll fill your timeline with boosts.

note:
Trans Radio UK looking out for our community - #LGBWithTheT

An account run by a team of TRUK people

🏳️‍⚧️ #LGBwiththeT 🏳️‍🌈 #LGBTQIA 🏆 Award-winning news service established in 2002 to cover Harry Potter, now reporting on the demise of JK Rowling's legacy.

Since 2020 — and now in our twenty-second year — we've been following the disturbing links between JKR's anti-LGBTQ+ bigotry and far-right, conservative & religious groups and their rhetoric.

Today, we advocate a boycott of all of Rowling's work, since she views it as tacit support for her bigoted positions.
